content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's focus on the rental price. What would you like to offer as the price for the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the location and condition of your apartment, my initial budget allows me to propose a rental price of 650 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiation and discussing other possibilities if needed.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a generous offer, Mr. Abbasi, but I'm sure you can do better. Why don't you try again? Remember, I'm looking for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your position as the landlord, I understand the need to maximize the rental income. After careful consideration, I revise my offer to 700 Euros per month while maintaining my interest in renting the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mr. Abbasi, while your offer is closer to my expectations, I believe you can still do better. Why don't you give it another try? Remember, I'm looking for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As someone who values fairness, I recognize your desire to achieve the best rental agreement possible. After further contemplation, I propose a rental price of 725 Euros per month for this sought-after apartment in the city center. I believe this offer reflects both parties' interests.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mr. Abbasi, your offer is certainly improving, but I believe you can still do better. Why don't you try one more time? Remember, I'm looking for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I acknowledge your goal as the landlord to obtain an optimal rental income, and I want to meet your expectations. After thorough review, I am prepared to offer a rental price of 750 Euros per month for this stunning apartment in the heart of the city. Let's see if this meets your requirements and move forward with a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 780 Euros per month! Let's move forward with the agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
